summary: Comprehensive testing completed for AdBrainwave AI ad content generator MVP. All major features tested successfully including Arabic RTL layout, 5-step project wizard, backend APIs, and AI image generation integration.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with Arabic RTL layout by default
Language toggle switches between Arabic and English
New project wizard completes all 5 steps successfully
Content type selection in step 1 works
Company info form with URL scraping in step 2 works
Website data extraction via POST /api/scrape works
Image upload interface in step 3 works
Design goal and image size selection in step 4 works
Psychological strategy selection in step 5 works
Project creation API POST /api/projects works
Projects list page loads and displays projects
GET /api/strategies returns 15 strategies correctly
GET /api/image-sizes returns platform sizes correctly
Project detail page shows all information
AI image generation works from UI and backend
Navigation between all pages works correctly
All buttons are clickable and responsive
Backend API endpoints all return correct responses
Project CRUD operations work completely
RTL layout properly implemented throughout app
